long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu item to auto fill the PR title for Azure Devops. Fetches the names from the 'to' and 'from' branches, then formats it as "<from> into <to>" and inserts it into the title input field.
